original_text: Then Samson continued on his journey to Timnah. He spoke with the young woman, and she pleased him very much.
korean_text: 그가 내려가서 그 여자와 말하니 그 여자가 삼손의 눈에 들었더라

sentences.original_text: Then Samson continued on his journey to Timnah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 삼손은 딤나로 가는 여정을 계속했습니다

sentences.original_text: He spoke with the young woman
and she pleased him very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 그를 매우 마음에 들었습니다
